W: Whenever this creature attacks with at least one other creature, add {W}.
Whenever this creature attacks with three or more creatures, add {W}{W}.
Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, add {W}.
Whenever this creature blocks a creature with greater power, add {W}{W}. Spend this mana only to cast instant spells.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Whenever a token enters the battlefield under your control, add {W}.
Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, add {W}{W}. Spend this mana only to cast enchantment spells.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or attacks, add {W}.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control with vigilance attacks, add {W}.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, add {W}.
Whenever this creature untaps during your untap step, add {W}.
Whenever you gain life, add {W}.
Whenever you gain 3 or more life, add {W}{W}.
Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, add {W}{W}. Spend this mana only during your postcombat main phase.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, add {W}.
Whenever you cast an Aura spell that targets a creature you control, add {W}.
Whenever an Aura you control becomes attached to a creature you control, add {W}{W}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Whenever you cast a white spell, add {W}.
Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, add {W}.
Whenever a creature you control with toughness 4 or greater blocks, add {W}{W}.
Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast spells that target that creature.
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, add {W}.
Whenever a creature you control dies, add {W}.
Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, add {W}.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures, add {W}{W}.
At the beginning of your end step, if you gained life this turn, add {W}. You don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end until your next turn begins.
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you attacked with two or more creatures this turn, add {W}{W}.
Whenever you create a 1/1 creature token, add {W}.
Whenever you create a token that’s a copy of another permanent, add {W}{W}.
U: Whenever this creature attacks and isn’t blocked, add {U}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {U}{U}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, add {U}.
Whenever this creature becomes untapped, add {U}.
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, add {U}{U}.
Whenever you draw a card, add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast noncreature spells.
Whenever you cast an instant spell, add {U}.
Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, add {U}.
Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent’s turn, add {U}.
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, add {U}{U}.
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 4 or greater, add {U}{U}.
Whenever you copy a spell, add {U}.
Whenever you counter a spell, add {U}{U}.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, add {U}.
Whenever one or more artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, add {U}{U}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.
Whenever a nontoken artifact you control becomes tapped, add {U}.
Whenever a permanent you control phases in, add {U}.
Whenever a permanent you control phases out, add {U}.
Whenever this creature or another creature with flying you control becomes tapped, add {U}.
Whenever this creature blocks a creature with flying, add {U}.
Whenever you scry, add {U}.
Whenever you scry three or more cards, add {U}{U}.
Whenever you mill one or more cards, add {U}. Spend this mana only to cast spells from your graveyard.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or more artifacts, add {U}{U}.
At the beginning of your end step, if you drew two or more cards this turn, add {U}.
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, add {U}{U}.
Whenever a spell or ability you control causes you to look at one or more cards of a library, add {U}.
Whenever you return a permanent you control to its owner’s hand, add {U}.
B: Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay 1 life. When you do, add {B}{B}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses 1 life and you add {B}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {B}{B}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, add {B}.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, add {B}{B}.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, add {B}.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, add {B}{B}. Spend this mana only to cast black spells.
Whenever a creature dies, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {B}.
Whenever a creature dies, you may exile it. When you do, add {B}{B}.
Whenever you sacrifice a creature, add {B}.
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, add {B}.
Whenever you discard a card, add {B}.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, add {B}.
Whenever an opponent loses life, add {B}. Spend this mana only to cast spells targeting that player.
Whenever you lose life, add {B}.
Whenever you pay life, add {B}. Spend this mana only to cast black spells or activate abilities of black permanents.
Whenever you cast a black spell, add {B}.
Whenever you cast your second black spell each turn, add {B}{B}.
Whenever a card leaves a graveyard, add {B}.
Whenever one or more cards are put into an opponent’s graveyard from anywhere, add {B}.
Whenever you exile a card from a graveyard, add {B}.
Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, add {B}.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield from a graveyard under your control, add {B}{B}.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. If you do, add {B}{B}.
At the beginning of your end step, if three or more creatures died this turn, add {B}{B}{B}.
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if an opponent lost 4 or more life this turn, add {B}{B}.
Whenever a noncreature permanent an opponent controls is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, add {B}.
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, add {B}.
R: Whenever this creature attacks, add {R}.
Whenever this creature attacks, add {R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast instant spells.
Whenever this creature attacks and isn’t blocked, add {R}{R}.
Whenever this creature attacks with another attacking creature, add {R}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {R}{R}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast spells during combat.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, add {R}.
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, add {R}.
Whenever a creature you control with haste attacks, add {R}.
Whenever you cast a red spell, add {R}.
Whenever you cast your second red spell each turn, add {R}{R}.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, add {R}.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets only this creature, add {R}{R}.
Whenever an instant or sorcery spell you control deals damage to one or more opponents, add {R}.
Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to a player, add {R}{R}.
Whenever a source you control deals 3 or more damage to a player, add {R}{R}{R}.
Whenever you discard a card at random, add {R}{R}.
Whenever you discard one or more cards, add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast spells that cause you to discard cards.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control untapped, add {R}.
Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, add {R}.
Whenever a nonbasic land enters the battlefield under an opponent’s control, add {R}.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, add {R}.
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, add {R}{R} instead of one mana of any color.
Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, add {R}.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, add {R}{R}.
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you attacked with a creature this turn, add {R}{R}.
Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less dies, add {R}.
Whenever you copy an instant or sorcery spell, add {R}.
Whenever this creature or another Warrior you control attacks, add {R}.
G: Whenever this creature attacks, add {G}.
Whenever this creature attacks, add {G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Whenever this creature attacks and isn’t blocked, add {G}{G}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {G}{G}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with mana value 4 or greater.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, add {G}.
Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell you control, add {G}.
Whenever this creature fights or becomes blocked, add {G}.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, add {G}.
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, add {G}{G}.
Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, add {G}{G}.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, add {G}.
Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, add {G}.
Whenever a basic land enters the battlefield under your control, add one mana of any color that land could produce.
Whenever a land you control becomes tapped for mana, add an additional {G}.
Whenever a land you control becomes untapped, add {G}.
Whenever a token enters the battlefield under your control, add {G}.
Whenever you draw a card with mana value 5 or greater, add {G}{G}.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, add {G}.
Whenever you cast a green spell, add {G}.
Whenever you cast your second creature spell each turn, add {G}{G}.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, add one mana of any color.
Whenever you gain life, add {G}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.
Whenever you put one or more +1/+1 counters on a creature you control, add {G}.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, add {G}.
Whenever you sacrifice a land, add {G}{G}.
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, add {G}.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {G}.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast creature or land spells.
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if you controlled three or more creatures that attacked this turn, add {G}{G}.
C: Whenever this creature attacks, add {C}.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, add {C}{C}.
Whenever this creature becomes untapped, add {C}.
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, add {C}.
Whenever one or more artifacts enter the battlefield under your control, add {C}{C}.
Whenever a nontoken artifact you control becomes tapped, add {C}.
Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, add {C}.
Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, add {C}{C}.
Whenever you create a Treasure token, add {C}.
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, add {C}{C}{C} instead of one mana of any color.
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, add {C}.
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, add {C}.
Whenever you cast your second colorless spell each turn, add {C}{C}.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, add {C}.
Whenever a nonbasic land enters the battlefield under your control, add {C}{C}.
Whenever you cast an Eldrazi spell, add {C}{C}.
Whenever you put a charge counter on a permanent you control, add {C}.
Whenever you remove a counter from a permanent you control, add {C}.
Whenever you proliferate, add {C}{C}.
Whenever a permanent you control becomes phased out or exiled and returns to the battlefield under your control, add {C}.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if you control three or more artifacts, add {C}{C}.
At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if an artifact entered the battlefield under your control this turn, add {C}.
Whenever you draw your third card each turn, add {C}{C}.
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 7 or greater, add {C}{C}{C}.
Whenever a land you control is tapped for mana, add an additional {C}.
